name: Wizard Duels (C_Ryder)
description:
Fight with your friends in an all-out magic duel! Shoot fireballs at your opponent to knock their lives down. Try to survive for as long as you can or gain as much points to win!

C O N T R O L S

(Red) Player 1:

WASD - Player Movement

R/T/Y - Fire/Water/Snow

(Blue) Player 2:

Arrow Keys - Player Movement

I/O/P - Fire/Water/Snow

Game made for "The Dream Arcade Archive" Game Jam in 5 days.
Made with Unity and Aseprite.

Music by Matthias (Youtube / Facebook):
Menu Theme - "Art of Mastery"
Game Theme - "Rainbow Road" 
End Theme
